title: Ticket #611: clarify descriptions of periodic_* submit commands
description: The prose describing submit description file commands: periodic_* need editing. The voice ought to be 3rd person (instead of 2nd), and the prose sometimes repeats itself.
remarks:
2009-Jul-06 10:36:00 by smoler:
In addition, clarify: if the job is running, can these expressions refer to only Job ClassAd attributes, or also to Machine ClassAd attributes?
check_ins: 2009-Aug-28 12:09   Check-in [24959]: edit and clarify on_exit_*, periodic_*, and next_job_start_delay submit commands (gittrac #611) (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
